comments: Great Professor, very funny. Easy A. Midterm takes a little time to complete and final group project is a paper based on a mock negotiation. Key for both papers is to use book terms and define them. You stay the full time for the first half of semester but get out early rest of the way. Highly recommend

This teacher for this course is good for an easy A. Personally very disappointed because you don\'t learn much out from the course. Lectures just mention material in book. Exercises actually don\'t teach you how to negotiate better.
A team project and an a open book mid-term. Very knowledgable and has many real world examples. Requires reading the text box. Overall fun class.

Negotiation strategy is a great class. I would highly recommend it as a good 3 credit class that is enjoyable and isn\'t crazy with the work. Great in class exercises and very funny prof. Very worthwhile.
Nice professor...knows the information and relates it to real world situations. Keeps you the entire time. Easy grader and you can tell he loves what he does.

Great class that covers Negotiations Strategies. Text book readings are a little long and boring, but fun class exercises reinforce the points. Prof is great with personal stories that show real life experiences. Mid-Term exam was take home and required ~4 hours to complete. Final Project was team project. Highly recommend this class & professor.
Good professor; lots of experience. Interesting class with lots of great discussion. Workload is pretty light.
